title: Saint-Gaudens National Historic Site: Park Home
body: Step into the world of one of America’s greatest artists  Discover the home, studios and gardens of Augustus Saint-Gaudens, one of America’s greatest sculptors. See over 100 of his artworks in the galleries and on the grounds, from heroic public monuments to expressive portrait reliefs, and the gold coins which changed the look of American coinage. Enjoy summer concerts, explore nature trails, or indulge your hidden talents during a sculpture class.                Enjoying a Sunday concert    The park hosts a Summer concert series, every Sunday afternoon in July and August.        Lincoln is here!   Sunday, June 26, a 12 ft, monumental bronze cast of the "Standing Lincoln" was unveiled at the park.
